scripts.prepare:test: mustache config/test.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/test.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:staging: mustache config/staging.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/staging.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:prod: mustache config/prod.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/prod.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.deploy:test: npm run prepare:test & graph deploy --product hosted-service peeranha/peeranha-test-2
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run prepare:staging & graph deploy --product hosted-service peeranha/peeranha-staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run prepare:prod & graph deploy --product hosted-service peeranha/peeranha
